creator: Appgeneration - Radio, Podcasts, Games
descriptionHtml:
CHECKERS is one of the most popular board games in the world. With awesome graphics and intuitive touch controls, play this classic board game online and challenge players from all over the world. Super fun and easy to play. Also perfect for developing logical thinking and enhancing memory.

PLAY ONLINE
Challenge real players from all over the world for a nice classic game of Checkers/Draughts. Choose your strategy carefully and capture all your opponent’s pieces!

BEAT THE COMPUTER
You can also play offline and test your playing skills against our challenging AI. With Hints and Undo moves feature so you can learn from the computer and perfect your gameplay.

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS
To make it even more fun, create a private room and invite a friend or play with a friend on the same device. Show them how good and smart you are!

CLIMB THE LEADERBOARD (soon available)
Track your stats and improve your performance. You will love this game and you won't stop playing until you are number 1. Compete for the top.

CUSTOMIZE AVATAR AND THEMES
Clean and user-friendly design to ensure you can enjoy and be focused solely on the game without any fuss or unwanted interruptions.
A great selection of stones and board design for you to choose from. Customize your avatar and choose a country.

TEST YOUR SKILLS
Have fun and sharpen your mind playing different game rules. Learn all the tricks and strategies. With lots of practice you will be unstoppable.

4 GAME RULES
American Checkers/English Draughts (8x8 board)
Spanish Checkers (8x8 board)
Brazilian Checkers (8x8 board)
Russian Checkers (8x8 board)

Are you a Checkers master?
Download and start playing now!
descriptionShort: Challenging Checkers game with 4 variations. Play online or offline.

- Bug fixes
We are always making improvements on the app from time to time to provide a better experience to our users.

creator: Appgeneration - Radio, Podcasts, Games
descriptionHtml:
DRAUGHTS is one of the most popular board games in the world. With awesome graphics and intuitive touch controls, play this classic board game online and challenge players from all over the world. Super fun and easy to play. Also perfect for developing logical thinking and enhancing memory.

PLAY ONLINE
Challenge real players from all over the world for a nice classic game of Draughts/Checkers. Choose your strategy carefully and capture all your opponent’s pieces!

BEAT THE COMPUTER
You can also play offline and test your playing skills against our challenging AI. With Hints and Undo moves feature so you can learn from the computer and perfect your gameplay.

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS
To make it even more fun, create a private room and invite a friend or play with a friend on the same device. Show them how good and smart you are!

CLIMB THE LEADERBOARD (soon available)
Track your stats and improve your performance. You will love this game and you won't stop playing until you are number 1. Compete for the top.

CUSTOMISE AVATAR AND THEMES
Clean and user-friendly design to ensure you can enjoy and be focused solely on the game without any fuss or unwanted interruptions.
A great selection of stones and board design for you to choose from. Customise your avatar and choose a country.

TEST YOUR SKILLS
Have fun and sharpen your mind playing different game rules. Learn all the tricks and strategies. With lots of practice you will be unstoppable.

4 GAME VARIATIONS
English Draughts/American Checkers (8x8 board)
Spanish Draughts (8x8 board)
Brazilian Draughts (8x8 board)
Russian Draughts (8x8 board)

Are you a Draughts master?
Download and start playing now!
descriptionShort: Challenging Draughts/Checkers game with 4 variations. Play online or offline.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Bug fixes
We are always making improvements on the app from time to time to provide a better experience to our users.
